overview: Inspired by classic fairytales, Villain tells the story of a female storybook villain a la Sleeping Beauty/Maleficent. Modern interpretations of classic stories are giving female villains the chance to tell the same classic story we all know and love...but from the villain's perspective, ultimately giving them the opportunity to take back their narrative.
tagline: This "Maleficent" inspired fairytale story is told from the villain's perspective.
title: Villain
